name: Abyssinica SIL
description: Abyssinica SIL is a Unicode font that supports Ethiopic and Latin languages. For more information please visit the Abyssinica SIL page on SIL International's Computers and Writing systems website, scripts.sil.org/AbyssinicaSIL To contribute, see github.com/silnrsi/font-abyssinica
author: SIL International
